hero.tagline: Engineering the architecture of artificial intelligence.

about.title: Architecting Intelligence
manifesto: I am a Data Science & AI Engineer specializing in mathematical optimization and data-driven systems that think.
Merging advanced machine learning with robust full-stack engineering, I design architectures that actively learn, reason, and resolve complex real-world challenges at scale.
From training deep neural networks to building enterprise-grade ecosystems, my directive is singular and absolute:
To push the extreme boundaries of machine capability and operational intelligence — and architect the future, one model at a time.

projects.title: Featured Engineering
projects.subtitle: A curated collection of high-performance AI systems, advanced algorithms, and full-stack ecosystems.

smart_eval.title: Smart Eval Ecosystem
smart_eval.description: An intelligent NLP-powered system that evaluates educational content by accurately classifying complex exam questions into domains such as logic and algebra — enabling automated, domain-aware assessment at scale.

sign_language.title: Sign Language AI Translator
sign_language.description: A real-time multimodal AI system that captures physical gestures via Computer Vision and translates them into natural, human-sounding speech using advanced Transformer and LSTM architectures.

adam_optimizer.title: Adam Optimizer — Live Visualization
adam_optimizer.description: An interactive, Python-based educational tool that brings the Adam optimization algorithm to life in 3D, demystifying gradient descent and complex mathematical convergence dynamics.

sdid_portal.title: SDID Academic Architecture
sdid_portal.description: A comprehensive, highly secure full-stack academic management portal engineered from scratch — featuring Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), multi-tenant course management, and isolated file submission pipelines.

robotic_arm.title: Industrial Robotic Control System
robotic_arm.description: A high-precision control ecosystem bridging Python Tkinter dashboards with Arduino serial communication for deterministic, zero-latency real-time robotic motor manipulation.
